quote: It is better to understand a little than to misunderstand.
Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
When a person's determination is strong and steadfast, God will join in their efforts.
Suffering is a lesson.
Science without religion is lame.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
The distinction between past, present, and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion.
A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit, and a violin; what else does a person need to be happy?
Be compassionate toward others, be strict with yourself.
The best way to motivate yourself is to give yourself a task.
We must not lose spirit. Spirit is the strongest stimulant for love, creativity, and the desire to live longer.
A person will be happy as long as they choose to be happy.
I do not expect to be everything to everyone. I just want to be something to someone.
When a person's intellect is complete, their speech becomes minimal.
Happy is the one who can be a master of themselves, a driver of their desires, and a captain of their life's ship.
An honest friend is more valuable than inherited wealth.
The most exhausting thing in life is being insincere.
It is open to you; this is how God gives us a way to strive. Never think the path is closed.
Procrastination is the grave in which opportunity is buried.
Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
Never try to make your son or daughter like yourself. One of you is enough.
If you can make others laugh, you will get all the love you want.
Trouble will come sooner or later. When it does, greet it as best as you can. The friendlier your welcome, the quicker it will leave.
We can do nothing to change the past, but everything we do can change the future.
Patience is the companion of wisdom.
Creative people are motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
Wherever you are, always strive to be the best and give the best of what we can offer.
Hatred, like love, is ignited by small things.
You don’t have to succeed on the first try.
One intense hour is far better and more profitable than years of dreaming and brooding.
The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches, but to help them find their own.
There is no guarantee of success, but not trying is a guarantee of failure.
I don’t know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everybody.
Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
We are not here to compete with each other. We are here to complement each other.
The more willing we are to take responsibility for our actions, the more credibility we possess.
It is always good to forgive, but best to forget a mistake.
Do not be like a rigid tree that breaks easily. Be like bamboo, able to bend and withstand the wind.
Do not cry over the failure of love, for humans will leave behind all they love.
If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
If there is no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.
Lack of intelligence can be improved by learning, lack of skill can be improved with experience, but lack of honesty is hard to fix.
Many people succeed thanks to the many difficulties and hardships they must face.
Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent. It is the one most adaptable to change.
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
Improving ourselves is improving the world.
Do not discriminate between good and bad work. Problems arise when we discriminate and take sides.
We must work selflessly. This applies to all work. Unconditional service is the best.
We must first find the power of love within ourselves before we can truly love others.
Seek just enough money to sustain life, so you can spare time and energy for spiritual practice.
Wealth does not make a person rich; it only makes them busier.
A grateful heart is not only the greatest virtue but the parent of all other virtues.
Freedom comes from people, not from laws or institutions.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
A person who makes a mistake and does not correct it is making another mistake.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
The flower that never fades on earth is virtue.
To imagine the unimaginable requires extraordinary imagination.
No difficulty can withstand persistence and perseverance. Without persistence, even the smartest and most talented often fail in life.
The only way to get love is to stop demanding it and start giving it without expecting anything in return.
If those who worry about their shortcomings would instead be grateful for their blessings, they would stop worrying.
Strive to create a 'wire' connecting your brain and heart.
A smile enriches the soul of the receiver without impoverishing the giver.
People rarely succeed unless they enjoy what they are doing.
I will go anywhere as long as it is forward.
If you have the will to win, you have achieved half your success. If you don’t have the will to win, you have achieved half your failure.
The secret to a rich life is having more beginnings than endings.
A truth not understood becomes an error.
I think, therefore I am.
A weak mentality is worse than a weak physique.
The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Our best friend and worst enemy is our own mind. It can be better than a doctor, a banker, or a trusted friend. It can also be more dangerous than a criminal.
Go as far as you can see, and when you get there, you will see further.
If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
An intellectual never says more than what they know.
Problems are the price you pay for progress.
Human life is full of dangers, but that is where its charm lies.
You cannot plan the future based on the past.
Optimism without effort is merely wishful thinking that bears no fruit.
If you are someone who likes to wait for opportunities, you are part of the majority.
I spent my 30s fixing all the mistakes I made in my 20s.
Strive not to be a person of success, but rather a person of value.
From now on, let’s not waste a single minute thinking about people we dislike.
When we stop making contributions, we begin to die.
The greatest mistake a person can make is to be afraid of making mistakes.
Do not call a person unhappy until they are dead. Do not judge someone’s work before it is finished.
Self-trust is the first secret of success.
You must be cautious with pleasure. Make sure you enjoy it and are not controlled by it.
Losing wealth can be regained, but losing trust is hard to recover.
If you cannot find peace within yourself, there is no use looking elsewhere.
We are so accustomed to hiding from others that we end up hiding from ourselves.
We are more busy convincing others that we are happy than actually feeling happiness itself.
You may be deceived if you trust too much, but your life will be miserable if you do not trust enough.
Be yourself. Who else could do it better than you?
If you want to be loved, love others and be lovable.
A good example is the best advice.
The strongest grass grows on the hardest ground.
You cannot teach a person anything; you can only help them find it within themselves.
The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
Happiness is not in what you gain, but in what you give.
There is no secret to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
I would rather lose my crown than do something I find shameful.
There is no cure for birth and death, save to enjoy the interval.
Hope never abandons us; we abandon hope.
To be clever enough to get all the money, one must be stupid enough to want it.
All the knowledge I possess everyone else can acquire, but my heart is all my own.
No matter how high a bird flies, it must still seek and find its food on the ground.
Decide what you want. Decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Set priorities and go to work.
Looking at trees, I understand patience. Watching grass, I appreciate persistence.
Eternal beauty lies in the grace of manners and the height of knowledge, not in one’s face or clothing.
We must believe that what God has destined for us is the best.
The peak of all courage is the courage to uphold justice, even when it concerns oneself.
Desires lead to misguidance and lack of principle, while reason guides toward virtue. Desires make you dream, but reason makes you weigh.
Striving for excellence motivates you; striving for perfection is demoralizing.
We could never learn to be brave and patient if there were only joy in the world.
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
An idealist is a person who helps other people to prosper.
Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably why so few engage in it.
Competition whose motive is merely to compete, to drive others out, never carries much benefit.
The lives of great men remind us that we can make our lives sublime.
My life is my amusement and never ceases to surprise. My life is like a drama with many acts but no closing scene.
What you see is what you achieve.
Happiness lies in overcoming desires and restraining excessive wants.
The insults of a wrongdoer are an honor to an honest person.
He who reflects too much will achieve little.
Don’t use people to build great work; use your work to build great people.
The biggest mistake you can make is believing you are working for someone else.
The greatest cowardice is proving our strength against the weakness of others.
Do not look back in regret, nor forward in fear, but around in awareness.
Do not wait for ideal circumstances. Do not wait for the best opportunities. Neither will ever come.
Most successful people I know are not busy; they are focused.
You can’t get much done in life if you only work on the days you feel good.
The walls we build to keep out sadness also keep out joy.
If you don’t design your own life plan, you’ll likely fall into someone else’s plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.
I can’t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
You don’t get to choose how or when you die. You can only decide how you live. Now.
If you want to succeed, you must create opportunities for yourself.
Work hard now, feel the results later; be lazy now, feel the consequences later.
To handle yourself, use your head. To handle others, use your heart.
No matter how much you can do, no matter how attractive your personality, you won’t go far if you can’t work with others.
The poorest person is the one who has nothing but money.
If we serve, life becomes more meaningful.
All difficulties are opportunities for the soul to grow.
You were born original; don’t die a copy.
It doesn’t matter how far you fall; what matters is how often you get back up.
If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more, and become more, you are a leader.
I believe the first test of a truly great person is humility.
The highest reward for a person’s toil is not what they get for it, but what they become by it.
Wrongdoing is common to all, but pretending is what breeds hostility and betrayal.
Grace often comes to us in the form of pain, loss, and disappointment; but if we are patient, we will soon see its true form.
True love doesn’t come to you; it must come from within you.
A person’s integrity is measured by their actions, not their profession.
We pray in sorrow and need; we should also pray in great joy and abundance.
To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what they have achieved, but at what they aspire to.
Sometimes, it’s the smallest decisions that can change your life forever.
When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
A noble person is guided by justice and strives to fulfill their duties.
We all live under the same sky, but we don’t all have the same horizon.
The wise feel ashamed if their words exceed their actions.
When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
Take responsibility for yourself. Realize that only you, not others, can take you where you want to go.
Even when faced with a dead end, love builds a bridge over it.
Do you know the secret of my success in achieving goals? Just persistence, nothing more.
Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment. Full effort is full victory.
Humility is the waiting room for perfection.
I’ve learned a lot from losses. Those losses have made me stronger.
Make your business successful the only way possible: hard work!
Kindness is a language the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
Do what you love, the money will follow.
There is never a wrong time to do the right thing.
Even if you’re on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
Happiness always seems small when held in your hands. But let it go, and you realize how big and precious it is.
Train yourself not to worry. Worrying never improves anything.
Maturity is not a state achieved by age. It is the development of love, learning, reading, and thinking that produces capability.
You don’t stop laughing because you grow old. You grow old because you stop laughing.
Proverbs are short sentences drawn from long experience.
Not being loved by others is sad, but even sadder is not being able to love others.
Poverty of the soul is more terrible than material poverty.
You can’t be called rich until you have something money can’t buy.
Education is the most powerful weapon you can use to change the world.
Throw away gloomy and angry thoughts, then rise up.
It is not the strong, but the persistent, who make great people.
Progress is the result of focusing all the strength of the soul and mind on the goal.
The longer we live, the more we find we are like other people.
Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
If a person tells the truth, they are sure, sooner or later, to be found out.
If your spirit is low, do something. If nothing changes, do something different.
Don’t fear mistakes. Wisdom is often born of mistakes.
I’ve never seen a monument erected for a pessimist.
Dare to admit mistakes and start anew.
Truth breeds courage.
He who asks is a fool for five minutes. He who does not ask remains a fool forever.
I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
The person who smiles is always stronger than the one who is angry.
The person who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Those who seek trouble never miss it.
Skill and confidence are an unconquered army.
A single arrow is easily broken, but not ten in a bundle.
Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare.
He who has never tasted bitterness does not know what is sweet.
By learning you will teach; by teaching you will learn.
I cried because I had no shoes, until I saw a man who had no feet.
Suffering produces perseverance; perseverance, character; and character, hope.
When the will is ready, the feet are light.
Knowing yourself is the beginning of self-improvement.
Do not underestimate a petty king, just as you should not underestimate a small river.
When someone teaches something, they themselves must practice it.
A great life is the culmination of great thoughts combined with great actions.
There are two ways of meeting difficulties: You alter the difficulties, or you alter yourself to meet them.
Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools speak because they have to say something.
Committing injustice is more shameful than suffering it.
He who cannot rule himself cannot rule others.
Patience is the best remedy for every trouble.
It is much easier to begin well than to end well.
Hope is the pillar that holds up the world.
Glorious victory is not only won on the battlefield but often in the heart.
We fall to rise, we halt to walk, and we sleep to wake.
You must face depression as you would face a tiger.
If you hire people smarter than you, you prove you are smarter than them.
Happiness is not having what you want, but wanting what you have.
An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory.
A great person is one who realizes that their failures are preparations for their victories.
Peace cannot be found in the external world; it resides in the human soul itself.
Trust others, and they will be true to you. Treat them as great, and they will show themselves great.
It is not enough to have a good mind. The main thing is to use it well.
Ask yourself the secret of success. Listen to your answer, and act on it.
If the grass is greener on the other side, be thankful you’re standing on ground to see it.
Your opportunity for success in any condition can be measured by how much faith you have in yourself.
Progress is a nice word, but change is its motivator, and change has many enemies.
Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by. And that has made all the difference.
The reason why worry kills more people than work is that more people worry than work.
Few rich men own their property. The property owns them.
Persistence can make the impossible possible, the possible likely, and the likely certain.
Only a foolish fish would be caught twice with the same bait.
Ambition is like seawater—the more you drink, the thirstier you become.
Anxiety and fear are the results of ignorance and doubt.
A hero is someone who does what they can.
If you want to be great, don’t boast, start by doing small things first.
The only way to change our lives is to change our minds.
Change happens when a person becomes themselves, not when they try to be someone else.
Improve yourself, but don’t put others down.
The quickest way to accomplish many things is to do them one at a time.
Two things should be forgotten: the good we have done for others and the wrongs others have done to us.
Remember, when you keep silent, you’ve already made a choice.
The human heart will never find peace until it makes peace with itself.
Life means struggle. A pleasant life without storms is like a dead sea.
Grief can only be endured by those who experience it themselves.
Dare to be yourself, because we can do that better than anyone else.
It’s better to be exiled than to surrender to hypocrisy.
The first step to believing in yourself is knowing yourself.
When someone loses all sources of happiness, they no longer live but are a breathing corpse.
Good, better, best. Never stop until good becomes better and better becomes best.
Motivation is a fire from within. If someone else tries to light it for you, it will likely burn only briefly.
I’m proud of what we didn’t do as much as what we did.
Love doesn’t require sacrifice. The moment you feel you’re sacrificing, your love begins to fade.
The real danger is not that computers will begin to think like humans, but that humans will begin to think like computers.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
Go as far as you can see, and when you get there, you will see further.
He that cannot forgive others breaks the bridge over which he must pass himself, for everyone needs forgiveness.
Seeing is believing, but feeling is the truth.
In matters of principle, stand like a rock. In matters of taste, swim with the current.
Every storm will pass, and I will grow stronger.
Only after losing everything are we free to do anything.
Seek knowledge, and to seek knowledge, learn to be calm and patient.
Live like a candle that lights others. Don’t live like a thorn that pricks yourself and hurts others.
Sorrow is a fruit. God does not let it grow on a branch too weak to bear it.
The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
The problem is not a lack of strength but a lack of will.
Winning isn’t everything, but the will to win is everything.
If you do not tell the truth about yourself, you cannot tell it about others.
The early bird catches the worm.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Success is more permanent when you achieve it without destroying your principles.
I always knew I was going to be rich. I don’t think I ever doubted it for a minute.
It is better to be prepared for an opportunity and not have one than to have an opportunity and not be prepared.
The only thing that can stop us is wrong beliefs and negative attitudes.
I am not afraid of tomorrow, for I have seen yesterday and I love today.
The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
All problems become smaller if you don’t dodge them but confront them.
The most meaningful change in life is a change in attitude. The right attitude leads to the right action.
If you have to make a choice and you don’t make it, that is in itself a choice.
Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.
Worry is like paying interest on money you may never borrow.
Do not often light the fire of hatred against your enemy, lest it burn yourself.
If you are true to yourself, as surely as day follows night, you cannot be false to anyone.
A bold flea dares to dine on a lion’s lip.
We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
As you grow older, you’ll find the only things you regret are the things you didn’t do.
The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love, and loyalty.
Most people fail to achieve their goals not because they lack ability, but because they lack commitment.
You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
